item.title: CVE-2022-24002|2024-08-03T03:59:23.388Z -- samsung%20mobile -- link%20sharing
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability in Link Sharing prior to version 12.4.00.3 allows attackers to open protected activity via PreconditionActivity.
